verbs.description: The magnitude of [ARG1: what] [V: was] [ARG2: about to happen] did n't hit trumpeter Robert Harrison Jr. until he was about to step on one of the world 's most famous stages — New

The magnitude of what was about to happen [V: did] n't hit trumpeter Robert Harrison Jr. until he was about to step on one of the world 's most famous stages — New

[ARG0: The magnitude of what was about to happen] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: hit] [ARG1: trumpeter Robert Harrison Jr.] [ARGM-TMP: until he was about to step on one of the world 's most famous stages — New]
The magnitude of what was about to happen did n't hit trumpeter Robert Harrison Jr. until [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: about to step on one of the world 's most famous stages — New]
